responsibilities: Build and maintain data products used to solve compliance and regulatory needs at DriveWealth
Establish best in class development practices that prioritize data quality without unnecessarily hindering deployment time
Work with business partners, compliance, and product managers to finalize requirements and anticipate future features
Collaborate with the broader data & analytics team to ideate, build, and maintain “self service” data products
Establish an open and scalable data culture through documentation, constructive code reviews, and clear explanations
Provide thought leadership, best practices on architecture and tooling, and standards for scalable data analytics solutions
Provide mentorship and guidance to analytics engineers and analysts
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on building and maintaining data products, establishing development practices, collaborating with teams, and providing mentorship. There is no mention of working with language models or tasks related to fine-tuning or customizing them. The responsibilities are more aligned with data analytics and engineering rather than language model development.
